rows.intro_text:
Welcome! It’s great to have you here. This week is about YOU. 

In this welcome workshop you will: 
* Get tools to care for yourself 
* Customise the app for your needs

intro_text.eng:
Welcome! It’s great to have you here. This week is about YOU. 

In this welcome workshop you will: 
* Get tools to care for yourself 
* Customise the app for your needs

reply_happy.eng: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.

reply_ok.eng: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!

reply_sad.eng: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!

rows.reply_happy: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.
rows.reply_ok: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!
rows.reply_sad: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!

rows.text: Let’s take a moment for YOU. Looking after yourself well starts with noticing how you feel.

text.eng: Let’s take a moment for YOU. Looking after yourself well starts with noticing how you feel.

reply_happy.eng: Great! So good to hear you are in a positive space.

reply_ok.eng: Things are not always easy. But that is how we can grow and learn every day!

reply_sad.eng: Life can be hard. Whatever you are feeling, you can be proud of yourself for being here!

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Great! So good to hear you are in a positive space.
rows.reply_ok: Things are not always easy. But that is how we can grow and learn every day!
rows.reply_sad: Life can be hard. Whatever you are feeling, you can be proud of yourself for being here!
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: You matter! Take a moment to check in with yourself.

text.eng: You matter! Take a moment to check in with yourself.

reply_happy.eng: Great to hear that you are doing well. You are a wonderful parent!

reply_ok.eng: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. Nobody has all the answers but you really do your best!

reply_sad.eng: Sorry to hear that you are not having a good day. Well done for getting up every morning and trying again, even when you are tired. That is real courage and dedication!

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Great to hear that you are doing well. You are a wonderful parent!
rows.reply_ok: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. Nobody has all the answers but you really do your best!
rows.reply_sad: Sorry to hear that you are not having a good day. Well done for getting up every morning and trying again, even when you are tired. That is real courage and dedication!
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Recognising how you feel helps you care for yourself well. You deserve it.

text.eng: Recognising how you feel helps you care for yourself well. You deserve it.

reply_happy.eng: Wonderful, I am so happy! Keep up the good work.

reply_ok.eng: Sorry that things are difficult. All families struggle. @global.parent_app is here to help!

reply_sad.eng: Whatever went ‘wrong’ today, let it go and try again tomorrow. It is okay!

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Wonderful, I am so happy! Keep up the good work.
rows.reply_ok: Sorry that things are difficult. All families struggle. @global.parent_app is here to help!
rows.reply_sad: Whatever went ‘wrong’ today, let it go and try again tomorrow. It is okay!
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Looking after yourself matters. And how you feel matters too!

text.eng: Looking after yourself matters. And how you feel matters too!

reply_happy.eng: Great! So good to hear that you are in a good space today. What a wonderful feeling!

reply_ok.eng: Sometimes things go great. Sometimes they do not. And sometimes we do not quite know what to think... and that is totally okay! Remember that you are not alone.

reply_sad.eng: Sorry that things are hard right now. You deserve good things, and @global.parent_app is here to support you every step of the way.

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Great! So good to hear that you are in a good space today. What a wonderful feeling!
rows.reply_ok: Sometimes things go great. Sometimes they do not. And sometimes we do not quite know what to think... and that is totally okay! Remember that you are not alone.
rows.reply_sad: Sorry that things are hard right now. You deserve good things, and @global.parent_app is here to support you every step of the way.
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Caring for yourself is so essential. When you know how you feel, you can see what you need.

text.eng: Caring for yourself is so essential. When you know how you feel, you can see what you need.

reply_happy.eng: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well. Keep up the good work.

reply_ok.eng: We all have better and worse days. The fact that you are here shows courage and commitment!

reply_sad.eng: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well. Keep up the good work.
rows.reply_ok: We all have better and worse days. The fact that you are here shows courage and commitment!
rows.reply_sad: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Remember that YOU matter! Let’s check in with our emotions first.

text.eng: Remember that YOU matter! Let’s check in with our emotions first.

reply_happy.eng: Well done for recognising a positive feeling. I am happy to hear you are feeling well today!

reply_ok.eng: Well done for recognising that you are not feeling great. Be kind to yourself, you deserve it.

reply_sad.eng: Well done for recognising a difficult feeling. It is okay not to be okay sometimes. Remember @global.parent_app is here to support you.

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Well done for recognising a positive feeling. I am happy to hear you are feeling well today!
rows.reply_ok: Well done for recognising that you are not feeling great. Be kind to yourself, you deserve it.
rows.reply_sad: Well done for recognising a difficult feeling. It is okay not to be okay sometimes. Remember @global.parent_app is here to support you.
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Self-care is a key parenting tool. It starts with recognising how we feel.

text.eng: Self-care is a key parenting tool. It starts with recognising how we feel.

reply_happy.eng: Great. And amazing that you are using this app – it shows your commitment as a parent. Make sure you give yourself credit and praise for what you are doing.

reply_ok.eng: Every day has its highs and lows. Praise yourself for being here and trying - you are moving forward.

reply_sad.eng: Sorry that things are difficult right now. Take a deep breath and know that you are valued.

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Great. And amazing that you are using this app – it shows your commitment as a parent. Make sure you give yourself credit and praise for what you are doing.
rows.reply_ok: Every day has its highs and lows. Praise yourself for being here and trying - you are moving forward.
rows.reply_sad: Sorry that things are difficult right now. Take a deep breath and know that you are valued.
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Recognising how you feel is key to handling life well. Be real and kind to yourself.

text.eng: Recognising how you feel is key to handling life well. Be real and kind to yourself.

reply_happy.eng: You are a star. And you are making a real difference. You can be proud of yourself.

reply_ok.eng: Everyone has good and bad days. Well done for using this app. It shows you are a committed parent. Remember to praise yourself for it!

reply_sad.eng: Sorry that things are not easy today. All parents have these days. You are trying and moving forward!

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: You are a star. And you are making a real difference. You can be proud of yourself.
rows.reply_ok: Everyone has good and bad days. Well done for using this app. It shows you are a committed parent. Remember to praise yourself for it!
rows.reply_sad: Sorry that things are not easy today. All parents have these days. You are trying and moving forward!
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Being a great parent also means taking time to care for yourself every day. It starts with recognising how you feel.

text.eng: Being a great parent also means taking time to care for yourself every day. It starts with recognising how you feel.

reply_happy.eng: So good to hear you are feeling well today. You are incredible!

reply_ok.eng: We all have days where we just don’t know. That is okay! You are here and that is what matters.

reply_sad.eng: Being a parent can be hard. But you are here and that shows you want to keep improving things. That is a big accomplishment already!

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: So good to hear you are feeling well today. You are incredible!
rows.reply_ok: We all have days where we just don’t know. That is okay! You are here and that is what matters.
rows.reply_sad: Being a parent can be hard. But you are here and that shows you want to keep improving things. That is a big accomplishment already!
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.text: Taking a moment for YOU makes a big difference for everyone!

text.eng: Taking a moment for YOU makes a big difference for everyone!

reply_happy.eng: Great that today is going well! What is one thing that has gone well today? Remember to praise yourself for it.

reply_ok.eng: Every day has its good and hard parts. Praise yourself for everything you have done so far - you are amazing.

reply_sad.eng: Sorry to hear you are feeling difficult feelings today. Well done for recognising those emotions, and trying to be calm and kind to yourself. You are setting a great example for your family.

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Great that today is going well! What is one thing that has gone well today? Remember to praise yourself for it.
rows.reply_ok: Every day has its good and hard parts. Praise yourself for everything you have done so far - you are amazing.
rows.reply_sad: Sorry to hear you are feeling difficult feelings today. Well done for recognising those emotions, and trying to be calm and kind to yourself. You are setting a great example for your family.
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Fantastic! And well done for investing in yourself and your family - you have accomplished a lot.

reply_happy.eng: Fantastic! And well done for investing in yourself and your family - you have accomplished a lot.

reply_ok.eng: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. @global.parent_app is here to help.

reply_sad.eng: Being a parent can be challenging. Take a deep breath and recognise all you have done for your family - you deserve praise!

intro_text.eng: It is great to see you again!

rows.reply_ok: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. @global.parent_app is here to help.
rows.reply_sad: Being a parent can be challenging. Take a deep breath and recognise all you have done for your family - you deserve praise!
rows.intro_text: It is great to see you again!
